thread.title: WatchBuddy® Timepieces announces release of Watches & Clocks for Basketball Lovers & Fans
thread.title_full: WatchBuddy® Timepieces announces release of Watches & Clocks for Basketball Lovers & Fans

author: prbuzz.com
title: WatchBuddy® Timepieces announces release of Watches & Clocks for Basketball Lovers & Fans
text:
Los Angeles, CA (PRBuzz) October 20, 2015 -- WatchBuddy® Timepieces - one of the nation’s finest makers of Theme Watches and Wall Clocks ( www.lovableproducts.com ) -- proudly announces the release of a collection of Watches and Clocks targeting Basketball Lovers and Fans! They are great for Christmas and Hanukah gifts!
Each of these finely crafted precision timepieces is graced with a beautiful dial picture of a Basketball Player(s), High Action Play or an Iconic Image such as a Basketball, Basketball and Hoop and Backboard - Swish.
Thus WatchBuddy® Timepieces magically transform watches & clocks from mere timepieces into delightful and joyful Objects of Delight for Basketball Lovers & Fans!
For further information about the WatchBuddy® - Basketball Watches - click here and for Clocks - click here . Additionally the search tool in the right upper hand corner is very helpful to locate a desired item.
WatchBuddy Watch and Clocks are also featured on many major online shopping venues such as Amazon.com. Most noteworthy is that WatchBuddy’s Store - All Lovable Products by WatchBuddy – is one of the highest rated seller’s on Amazon.com based on Customer Satisfaction Ratings and Customer Service Metrics.
_ _ _ _
About WatchBuddy® Brand Products:
WatchBuddy® is a registered trademark brand of watches, jewelry and fashion accessories held by GreatMerchants.com, Inc., a large group of web based and brick & mortar businesses bringing unique, innovative and creative products and services to consumers.
